red over red+white

```{r}
sheets_deauth()
x <- read_sheet("1cgP-e6THVfiW5TJ95QhX3jkNxKvc8Sicp9k_BkSRd2I")

clean_x <- x%>%
na.omit()%>%
  mutate(red_prop = red/(red+white))

x_plot <- ggplot(clean_x, aes(x = red_prop))+
  geom_histogram()

clean_x%>%
  summarize(prop = sum(red)/(sum(red)+sum(white)))%>%
  pull()

  x_plot
```
